title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 72.2 - Application; how made
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 72.2 - Application; how made

State Regulations

An application for a stay of an "unsafe notice" shall be
made by a verified petition on notice to the Commissioner of Labor as
hereinafter set forth. The original and three conformed copies of the petition
and of all accompanying papers, with proof of service thereof upon the office
of the commissioner's general counsel and the office of the director of the
division which issued the said order, shall be filed with the board at its

Albany office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
72.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
